page.title: 12SPORT 2
page.content: Interviewees were also asked to select sports which are available at the Centre which might interest them. 29% were not interested in any sport. The most popular activity was jogging and the least popular were aerobics and keep-fit. Below are the full results. Jogging 64 choices Trampolining 43 choices Badminton 42 choices 5-a-side Football 42 choices Swimming 4l choices Volleyball 39 choices Basketball 38 choices Synchro-swimming 35 choices Squash and Tennis 31 choices each Weight-training 26 choices Jazz-dance 26 choices Keep-fit 23 choices Aerobics 22 choices
